name: Dream (itch) (ZachCreates)
description:
Play as Rose, a psychic who has helped the police in the past, as she starts to encounter strange and disturbing memory sequences in her dreams. In the glimpses of these memories, she can only see the most important details, so often the memories aren't very accurate.  Use this knowledge to find your way through each memory and discover the story at hand.

-How is it HQ Residential House Related?-

      Good question. I would say that my game is related to the HQ Residential House because it deals with a suburban looking house in each of the protagonist's dreams. I hope this captures the element of the house enough.

-Controls-

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • E to interact

-REQUIRED CREDITING-

  • "Bloodsplatter FX Pack" © 2020 Mia Rosado (BlueRoseSonata), CC-BY 4.0

      This asset was really cool! All I did to the provided asset was turn them into transparent images with a website, and I had some super cool blood splatters that are very close to the originals! If you want to check out this asset for yourself, go here https://bluerosesonata.itch.io/free-blood-splatter-cgsfx! This is a link to the license that this asset has: Creative Commons — Attribution 4.0 International — CC BY 4.0.

  • The main menu background sound is from an asset made by Seth O'Dale.
